name: Derp in Trouble
description:
Derp in Trouble was created at Devmania 2014 in Mainz for the "Overnight Contest" in about 12 hours with the theme "Memes".

You play Derp and have to to find Derpina, but at some places you can change into a different meme for some amount of with different abilities, which are needed to progress through the level.

Due to the short amount of time we had to create the game and being a team of just two people, it is very short, but the mechanics work pretty well.
